name: Chronos Materia
description: Chronos Materia is a CANCELLED role-playing video game by Gust Co. Ltd. The title was announced in 2013 as a PlayStation Vita exclusive title, but was quietly cancelled in April 2016. The game was intended to be a new IP by Gust, that would have mixed many of the elements of their Atelier and Ar Nosurge series of games with elements of time travel.
